Content: 25*p42918a02528*	*(b)	 the cochlea in a chickenâ€™s inner ear is lined with hair cells that can detect different frequencies of sound.  the frequency detected depends on the type of bk channel protein present in the cell membrane.		one report suggests that there are 48 different bk channel proteins in these hair cells.		the cslo gene codes for all of these bk channel proteins.		explain how one cslo gene can give rise to different bk channel proteins in these hair cells.(6)(total for question 8 = 9 marks)total for paper = 90 marks
